EmailTemplate.name: 08_31_2015 VIP Party Reminder.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} It's Time To Party!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, You're invited to unwind with VMTurbo and our partners, Arista Networks, Nutanix & Pure Storage at our 3rd annual VMTurbo VIP Cocktail party. On top of a memorable night we will be giving one lucky winner an all expense paid trip anywhere in the world so you can reach your desired state. <http://vmturbo.com/resources/events/vmturbo-2015-vip-cocktail-party?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vipinvite2015&utm_content=08182015> Monday, August 30th 2015 6:30 - 9:00 PM The Drake <http://www.drakesf.com/> 508 4th Street San Francisco, CA 94107 <http://www.drakesf.com/>- The VMTurbo Team
